content:
US Core STU 4 has the $docref operation

The official URL for this operation definition is http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/OperationDefinition/docref

which resolves to US Core STU 3.1.1 at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3.1.1/OperationDefinition-docref.html ??

(also in current build)
@Grahame Grieve ping re this... any ideas why?
bug in the publishing code. Also queued for upload
